Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“Wish we could go far, far away...”

Monologue.Original: Male Student{Line}“I wonder if our dreams{Line} await us beyond the horizon...?”

Monologue.Current: (My dream...{Line} Just as uncertain as our situation.)
Monologue.Original: (My dream...{Line} Just as uncertain as our situation.)

Monologue.Current: Male Student{Line}“Man... Just gazing at the ocean{Line} kinda makes you forget about{Line} all that studyin’ we’ve endured...”
Monologue.Original: Male Student{Line}“Man... Just gazing at the ocean{Line} kinda makes you forget about{Line} all that studyin’ we’ve endured...”

Monologue.Current: Female Student{Line}“Know what...? I’m never gonna{Line} forget about my Garden friends.”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“Know what...? I’m never gonna{Line} forget about my Garden friends.”

Monologue.Current: Female Student{Line}“Yeah, let’s be sure to keep in touch{Line} even after we graduate!”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“Yeah, let’s be sure to keep in touch{Line} even after we graduate!”

Monologue.Current: Female Student{Line}“And let me know right away{Line} when you get yourself a BOYFRIEND!”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“And let me know right away{Line} when you get yourself a BOYFRIEND!”

Monologue.Current: Female Student{Line}“That goes for everyone.{Line} Promise!?”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“That goes for everyone.{Line} Promise!?”

Monologue.Current: Female Student{Line}“No problem!{Line} I promise! I promise!!!”
Monologue.Original: Female Student{Line}“No problem!{Line} I promise! I promise!!!”

Monologue.Current: (Oh no...{Line} I can’t let her know I have a boyfriend.)
Monologue.Original: (Oh no...{Line} I can’t let her know I have a boyfriend.)

Monologue.Current: (I’m sure I’ll have one before she does.)
Monologue.Original: (I’m sure I’ll have one before she does.)

Monologue.Current: (You guys are sooo great.{Line} I’ll definitely keep my promise.)
Monologue.Original: (You guys are sooo great.{Line} I’ll definitely keep my promise.)

Monologue.Original: “All members of the Garden Festival{Line} committee have been dispatched to{Line} conflicts around the world.”{Next}“That transfer student seems to be really{Line} enthusiastic about it, but...”

Monologue.Current: “Тебе интересно, чем мы занимаемся?”{Line}Конечно{Line}Не очень
Monologue.Original: “Are you interested in what I’m doing?”{Line}Interested{Line}Not interested

Monologue.Current: “Тогда ты должен приссоединиться{Line} к нашей команде!”
Monologue.Original: “Then you should join the{Line} Garden Festival committee, too!”

Monologue.Current: “Тогда не привлекай к нам лишнего{Line} внимания, ладно? Когда мы закончим,{Line} хочу, чтобы все ахнули от удивления!”
Monologue.Original: “Then don’t attract a crowd, ok?{Line} I wanna surprise everyone once it’s done!”

Monologue.Current: “Ну давай же, приссоединяйся{Line} к нашему комитету!{Line}Не{Line}Ладно
Monologue.Original: “C’mon, join the Garden Festival committee!{Line}Nah{Line}Sure

Monologue.Current: “Фу! Ну почему вы все такие?{Line} Неужели никто не хочет как следует{Line} оторваться, насладиться феерически{Line} шоу, великолепным праздником?!”
Monologue.Original: “Boo! Why does everybody have to{Line} be like that!? Doesn’t anyone{Line} want to enjoy the Garden Festival?”

Monologue.Current: “Яхууууу!{Line} Отлично, за работу!”
Monologue.Original: “Whoo-hoo!{Line} Ok, let’s get to work!”

Monologue.Current: “Не отвлекай, ладно?”
Monologue.Original: “Fine, just don’t bother me, ok?”

Monologue.Current: “Работаем, работаем, РАБОТАЕМ!{Line} У нас тут нехватка грубой{Line} мужской силы, если ты не заметил!”
Monologue.Original: “Alright, work, work, WORK!{Line} Not too many guys on this team, you know!”

Monologue.Current: “Эй, я не собираюсь говорить,{Line} что тебе делать! Прояви инициативу!”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, are you the type that{Line} has to be told what to do?”
